snippet: A 115-page report about charges of racist abuse by Liverpool striker Luis Suarez lays out the evidence that led to his eight-game suspension and calls him an unreliable witness.
abstract: A 115-page report about charges of racist abuse by Liverpool striker Luis Suarez lays out the evidence that led to his eight-game suspension and calls him an unreliable witness.
lead_paragraph: England's Football Association on Saturday released the 115-page report compiled by an independent commission that suspended Liverpool striker Luis Suárez for eight games. The document lays out in painstaking detail the evidence that Suárez directed a racist insult at a black opponent during a Premier League game in October, as well as the methods it used to go about determining his punishment.

headline.main: Does the F.A.'s Report Change Your Opinion on Suárez?
